title: HOT FEET Work Socks for Men - Long Warm Winter Boot Crew Cotton Socks, Cushioned, Moisture Wicking 10-Pack, Size 6-12.5
description: All-Weather Work Socks - With full arch support and a reinforced heel, these mens socks crew are ideal for work or outdoor use. Wear them while doing heavy-duty jobs, camping, hiking, or hunting.
Made Especially for Men - Fitting USA men’s shoe sizes 6–12.5, these men's socks size 10–13, making them one-size-fits-most. For best results, machine wash on cold and tumble dry on low.
Soft & Comfortable - Made from premium cotton, these mens crew socks offer all-day comfort. Their ribbed cuffs ensure they'll stay put, so you don't have to worry about them slipping or sliding down.
Mens Moisture Wicking Socks - These mens work socks come in white and black, so they'll complement most shoes and boots. They're cushioned for shock absorption and will wick sweat away.
For All Seasons - Designed for all-weather performance, these men socks feature a mesh ventilation panel. They'll keep your feet comfortable on the job or while you lounge at home.
